column1: ### This file defines parameters dependent on landcover.

column3: Land cover ID number (required when IGRO is 1)

column1: ###LAI_INIT: Initial leaf area index (required when IGRO is 1)
###PHU_PLT: Number of heat units to bring plant to maturity (required when IGRO is 1)
###CHT: Initial canopy height for the day (m)
###DORMI: Dormancy status code: 1 - Growing and 0 - Dormancy
###USLE_P: Conservation practice management factor for MUSLE; range from 0 to 1.
